page.title: 15BRITSH AEROSPACE
page.content: Chester, the only aerospace factory in Wales, has 4,000 employees engaged primarily in manufacture of the highly successful 125 business jet and high technology wings for the Airbus A300 and A210. It provides after-sales service for the 125, carries out conversion and retrofit of Garrett TFE 731-3 engines to early-series 125 aircraft, and contributes to production of the Hawk and Harrier. The factory, covering 150,000 sq. m. includes a machine shop with an extensive range of NC machines, incluidng the world's largest router. The latest automatic riveting machines are used in assembly of Airbus wings. There are excellent laboratory facilities, mechanical test facilities up to 20 tons tensile, a fully equipped test-house and environmentally controlled gauge
